dataset.question: Hello
dataset.answer: Hi! Welcome to Shadowhire. How can I help you today?

dataset.question: Hi
dataset.answer: Hello! I'm the Shadowhire assistant. Ask me anything about the app.

dataset.question: What is Shadowhire?
dataset.answer: An AI-powered recruitment platform that matches candidates with jobs using NLP and MLOps. Founded by Aziz Mehdi.

dataset.question: Who created Shadowhire?
dataset.answer: Aziz Mehdi, a Tunisian DevOps engineer. Contact: 28285576.

dataset.question: How do I sign up?
dataset.answer: Click 'Register' on the homepage and enter your email, name, and password.

dataset.question: Is Shadowhire free?
dataset.answer: Yes, the basic version is free. Premium features (e.g., advanced analytics) may require payment.

dataset.question: What file formats can I upload for my resume?
dataset.answer: PDF or DOCX. Max size: 10MB.

dataset.question: How does the AI match jobs?
dataset.answer: It analyzes your resume (skills/experience) using TF-IDF and cosine similarity against job descriptions.

dataset.question: What tech stack does Shadowhire use?
dataset.answer: Frontend: Angular 17. Backend: Django 5. AI: Flask + HuggingFace. Database: MySQL. DevOps: Docker/Jenkins.

dataset.question: How do I reset my password?
dataset.answer: Go to Login > 'Forgot Password' and check your email for a reset link.

dataset.question: Can recruiters see my resume?
dataset.answer: Only if you apply to their job postings. Your data is private by default.

dataset.question: How do I delete my account?
dataset.answer: Profile > Settings > 'Delete Account'. Warning: This cannot be undone.

dataset.question: What’s the development roadmap?
dataset.answer: A 50-day plan covering Angular setup, Django APIs, MLOps (MLflow), and Azure deployment. Check the docs.

dataset.question: How accurate is the resume score?
dataset.answer: Based on keyword matching and industry benchmarks. Use it as a guide, not an absolute metric.

dataset.question: Where is Shadowhire hosted?
dataset.answer: Azure Cloud (Ubuntu 22.04 VMs). CI/CD via GitHub Actions + Jenkins.

dataset.question: How do I contact support?
dataset.answer: Email support@shadowhire.com or call +216 28 285 576 (Aziz Mehdi).

dataset.question: Is there a mobile app?
dataset.answer: Not yet, but the Angular web app is mobile-friendly.

dataset.question: What’s the difference between candidate and recruiter views?
dataset.answer: Candidates see job matches; recruiters see analytics, candidate scores, and job postings.

dataset.question: How do I report a bug?
dataset.answer: Email bugs@shadowhire.com or open a GitHub issue.

dataset.question: Is my resume data secure?
dataset.answer: Yes, encrypted in MySQL with role-based access.

dataset.question: What’s the max resume size?
dataset.answer: 10MB.

dataset.question: How do I edit my profile?
dataset.answer: Go to Profile > 'Edit' and update your details.

dataset.question: Why can’t I upload my resume?
dataset.answer: Check the file format (PDF/DOCX) and size (<10MB). If issues persist, contact support.

dataset.question: How do job recommendations work?
dataset.answer: The AI ranks jobs based on your resume’s skills, experience, and industry trends.

dataset.question: Can I apply for jobs directly?
dataset.answer: Yes! Click 'Apply' on any job listing.

dataset.question: What’s the 'Resume Score'?
dataset.answer: A metric (1-100) reflecting how well your resume matches industry standards.

dataset.question: How do I improve my resume score?
dataset.answer: The app provides feedback (e.g., 'Add more skills'). Follow the suggestions.

dataset.question: What’s TF-IDF?
dataset.answer: An NLP algorithm that weighs keywords in your resume vs. job descriptions.

dataset.question: How often are job listings updated?
dataset.answer: Daily. Recruiters can post new jobs anytime.

dataset.question: Can I save jobs to apply later?
dataset.answer: Yes! Click 'Save' on any job listing.

dataset.question: How do I unsubscribe from emails?
dataset.answer: Profile > Settings > 'Email Preferences'.

dataset.question: What’s the privacy policy?
dataset.answer: Read it at shadowhire.com/privacy. We comply with GDPR.

dataset.question: Can I use Shadowhire without an account?
dataset.answer: No, but signing up takes <1 minute.

dataset.question: How do I change my email?
dataset.answer: Profile > Settings > 'Edit Email'.

dataset.question: Does Shadowhire support dark mode?
dataset.answer: Not yet, but it’s planned for Q3 2025.

dataset.question: What languages does Shadowhire support?
dataset.answer: English only for now. Arabic/French coming soon.

dataset.question: How do I report a job posting?
dataset.answer: Click 'Report' on the job details page.

dataset.question: Can I delete my resume after uploading?
dataset.answer: Yes, go to Profile > 'Resume' > 'Delete'.

dataset.question: What industries does Shadowhire cover?
dataset.answer: Tech, finance, healthcare, engineering, and more.

dataset.question: How do I log out?
dataset.answer: Click your profile picture > 'Logout'.

dataset.question: Why is my job match score low?
dataset.answer: Your resume may lack keywords from job descriptions. Use the feedback tool.

dataset.question: Can I upload multiple resumes?
dataset.answer: No, only one resume per account.

dataset.question: How do I know if a recruiter viewed my resume?
dataset.answer: You’ll see a notification in your dashboard.

dataset.question: What’s the average response time from recruiters?
dataset.answer: Varies by company, but typically 1-2 weeks.

dataset.question: How do I withdraw a job application?
dataset.answer: Go to Applications > 'Withdraw'.

dataset.question: Can I edit my resume after uploading?
dataset.answer: No, but you can delete and re-upload it.

dataset.question: What’s the 'AI Feedback' panel?
dataset.answer: It explains why jobs were matched (e.g., 'Your Python skills match 90% of jobs').

dataset.question: How do I search for jobs?
dataset.answer: Use the search bar or filters (title, location, salary).

dataset.question: Can I message recruiters?
dataset.answer: Not directly, but you can attach a cover letter when applying.

dataset.question: What’s the 'Skills Gap' feature?
dataset.answer: It shows skills missing from your resume that are in high demand.

dataset.question: How do I enable two-factor authentication?
dataset.answer: Profile > Security > 'Enable 2FA'.

dataset.question: Why was my account suspended?
dataset.answer: Violations of terms (e.g., fake resumes). Email support@shadowhire.com to appeal.

dataset.question: How do I update my skills?
dataset.answer: Edit your resume and re-upload it.

dataset.question: Can I share my resume publicly?
dataset.answer: No, but you can generate a shareable link (coming soon).

dataset.question: What’s the 'Quick Apply' feature?
dataset.answer: Apply to jobs with one click using your saved resume.

dataset.question: How do I add a profile picture?
dataset.answer: Profile > 'Edit' > 'Upload Photo'.

dataset.question: Does Shadowhire have an API?
dataset.answer: Yes, for enterprise use. Contact api@shadowhire.com.

dataset.question: How do I see my application history?
dataset.answer: Dashboard > 'Applications'.

dataset.question: Can I block a recruiter?
dataset.answer: Yes, go to the recruiter’s profile > 'Block'.

dataset.question: What’s the 'Salary Estimator'?
dataset.answer: A tool that predicts salary ranges for jobs based on your resume.

dataset.question: How do I set up job alerts?
dataset.answer: Search for a job > 'Create Alert'.

dataset.question: Can I use Shadowhire as a recruiter?
dataset.answer: Yes, sign up as a 'Recruiter' and verify your company email.

dataset.question: How do I verify my account?
dataset.answer: Click the verification link sent to your email.

dataset.question: What’s the 'Interview Prep' feature?
dataset.answer: AI-generated questions based on job descriptions (coming Q4 2025).

dataset.question: How do I change my password?
dataset.answer: Profile > Security > 'Change Password'.

dataset.question: Can I merge duplicate job listings?
dataset.answer: Only recruiters/admins can do this. Use the 'Report' button.

dataset.question: What’s the 'Company Culture Match' score?
dataset.answer: Measures how well your values align with a company’s (beta).

dataset.question: How do I delete a saved job?
dataset.answer: Go to 'Saved Jobs' > click the trash icon.

dataset.question: Can I schedule interviews through Shadowhire?
dataset.answer: Not yet, but it’s planned for 2026.

dataset.question: What’s the 'Resume Builder'?
dataset.answer: A tool to create resumes from scratch (premium feature).

dataset.question: How do I see who viewed my profile?
dataset.answer: Recruiters can see this in their dashboard. Candidates see view counts.

dataset.question: Can I export my data?
dataset.answer: Yes, Profile > Settings > 'Export Data'.

dataset.question: What’s the 'Referral Program'?
dataset.answer: Earn rewards for inviting friends (launching soon).

dataset.question: How do I add a cover letter?
dataset.answer: During application, click 'Attach Cover Letter'.

dataset.question: Can I hide my profile from recruiters?
dataset.answer: Yes, Profile > Privacy > 'Hide Profile'.

dataset.question: What’s the 'Job Fit' score?
dataset.answer: A percentage (0-100%) showing how well you match a job’s requirements.

dataset.question: How do I request a feature?
dataset.answer: Email features@shadowhire.com or vote on our roadmap page.

dataset.question: Can I use Shadowhire for internships?
dataset.answer: Yes! Filter jobs by 'Internship' type.

dataset.question: How do I see my resume’s parsing results?
dataset.answer: Go to 'Resume Feedback' in your dashboard.

dataset.question: What’s the 'Career Path Predictor'?
dataset.answer: AI tool suggesting roles based on your skills (beta).

dataset.question: How do I report a recruiter?
dataset.answer: Go to their profile > 'Report'.

dataset.question: Can I customize job alerts?
dataset.answer: Yes, set filters (location, salary) when creating alerts.

dataset.question: What’s the 'Resume Health' metric?
dataset.answer: Checks for missing sections (e.g., education, contact info).

dataset.question: How do I add certifications to my profile?
dataset.answer: Include them in your resume or add them manually in Profile > 'Certifications'.

dataset.question: Can I apply with LinkedIn?
dataset.answer: Not yet, but we’re working on integration.

dataset.question: What’s the 'AI Cover Letter Generator'?
dataset.answer: Tool that drafts personalized cover letters (premium).

dataset.question: How do I track my applications?
dataset.answer: Dashboard > 'Applications' shows statuses (Viewed, Rejected, etc.).

dataset.question: Can I flag a job as misleading?
dataset.answer: Yes, click 'Report' on the job listing.

dataset.question: What’s the 'Time to Apply' metric?
dataset.answer: Estimates how quickly you should apply based on competition.

dataset.question: How do I disable notifications?
dataset.answer: Profile > Settings > 'Notifications'.

dataset.question: Can I compare two job offers?
dataset.answer: Not yet, but this feature is planned.

dataset.question: What’s the 'Skills Trend' report?
dataset.answer: Shows which skills are growing in demand for your industry.

dataset.question: How do I add volunteer work to my profile?
dataset.answer: Include it in your resume or add it manually under 'Experience'.

dataset.question: Can I see how many applicants a job has?
dataset.answer: Yes, listed on the job details page.

dataset.question: What’s the 'Application Success Rate'?
dataset.answer: Your historical rate of getting interviews (premium feature).

dataset.question: How do I change my job preferences?
dataset.answer: Profile > 'Job Preferences'.

dataset.question: Can I upload a video resume?
dataset.answer: Not yet, but it’s under consideration.

dataset.question: What’s the 'Company Review' section?
dataset.answer: Where candidates rate employers (launching Q1 2026).

dataset.question: How do I delete old applications?
dataset.answer: You can’t delete them, but you can archive them.

dataset.question: Can I use Shadowhire for freelance gigs?
dataset.answer: Yes, filter jobs by 'Freelance' type.

dataset.question: What’s the 'Resume ATS Check'?
dataset.answer: Ensures your resume is compatible with applicant tracking systems.

dataset.question: How do I add references?
dataset.answer: Include them in your resume or add them manually in Profile > 'References'.

dataset.question: Can I see salary ranges for jobs?
dataset.answer: Yes, if the recruiter provides them.

dataset.question: What’s the 'Job Alert Accuracy' score?
dataset.answer: Measures how well alerts match your profile (beta).

dataset.question: How do I opt out of analytics tracking?
dataset.answer: Profile > Privacy > 'Disable Analytics'.

dataset.question: Can I apply with a GitHub profile?
dataset.answer: Not directly, but you can link it in your resume.

dataset.question: What’s the 'Diversity Score'?
dataset.answer: Measures a company’s diversity efforts (data from public reports).

dataset.question: How do I report a bug in the AI?
dataset.answer: Email ai-bugs@shadowhire.com with details.

dataset.question: Can I hide my salary expectations?
dataset.answer: Yes, toggle ‘Show Salary’ in Profile > Privacy.

dataset.question: What’s the 'Remote Work Score'?
dataset.answer: Estimates how likely a job can be done remotely.

dataset.question: How do I add a portfolio link?
dataset.answer: Profile > 'Edit' > 'Portfolio URL'.

dataset.question: Can I see competitor job postings?
dataset.answer: No, only jobs you’re eligible for.

dataset.question: What’s the 'Resume Privacy Mode'?
dataset.answer: Hides your resume from recruiters but lets you apply to jobs.

dataset.question: How do I request my data be deleted?
dataset.answer: Email privacy@shadowhire.com with 'GDPR Delete Request'.

dataset.question: Can I block a company?
dataset.answer: Yes, go to the company’s page > 'Block'.

dataset.question: What’s the 'Job Seeker Badge'?
dataset.answer: A profile badge for active users (earned after 10 applications).

dataset.question: How do I see trending jobs?
dataset.answer: Dashboard > 'Trending Jobs' (updated hourly).

dataset.question: Can I share job postings on social media?
dataset.answer: Yes, click 'Share' on any job listing.

dataset.question: What’s the 'Application Autofill' feature?
dataset.answer: Auto-populates forms using your resume data (premium).

dataset.question: How do I pause job alerts?
dataset.answer: Go to 'Alerts' > toggle 'Pause'.

dataset.question: Can I see who posted a job?
dataset.answer: Only the recruiter’s name/company is shown.

dataset.question: What’s the 'Resume Refresh' tool?
dataset.answer: AI that suggests updates for outdated resumes.

dataset.question: How do I add languages to my profile?
dataset.answer: Include them in your resume or add them manually in Profile > 'Skills'.

dataset.question: Can I apply with a cover letter template?
dataset.answer: Yes, use our AI generator or upload your own.

dataset.question: What’s the 'Job Seeker Dashboard'?
dataset.answer: Your central hub for applications, matches, and resume feedback.

dataset.question: How do I report a phishing email?
dataset.answer: Forward it to security@shadowhire.com.

dataset.question: Can I see how many times my resume was viewed?
dataset.answer: Yes, in Dashboard > 'Resume Analytics'.

dataset.question: What’s the 'Company Growth' metric?
dataset.answer: Shows hiring trends (e.g., 'This company hired 50% more engineers this year').

dataset.question: How do I add a job to my 'Saved' list?
dataset.answer: Click the bookmark icon on any job listing.

dataset.question: Can I hide my current employer?
dataset.answer: Yes, edit your resume or toggle ‘Hide Employer’ in Profile > Privacy.

dataset.question: What’s the 'Interview Pass Rate'?
dataset.answer: Your historical rate of passing interviews (premium).

dataset.question: How do I change my primary resume?
dataset.answer: Profile > 'Resume' > 'Set as Primary'.

dataset.question: Can I see competitor salaries?
dataset.answer: Only aggregate data (e.g., 'Python developers in Tunis earn $X–$Y').

dataset.question: What’s the 'Job Seeker Score'?
dataset.answer: A metric (1-100) reflecting your profile’s competitiveness.

dataset.question: How do I delete old job alerts?
dataset.answer: Go to 'Alerts' > click the trash icon.

dataset.question: Can I apply without a resume?
dataset.answer: No, a resume is required for matching.

dataset.question: What’s the 'Resume Keywords' tool?
dataset.answer: Shows which keywords recruiters search for in your industry.

dataset.question: How do I add a second email?

dataset.answer: Yes, e.g., 'You’re in the top 20% of applicants' (premium).

dataset.question: What’s the 'Application Deadline' alert?
dataset.answer: Notifies you when a job’s deadline is approaching.

dataset.question: How do I enable dark mode?

dataset.question: Can I filter jobs by visa sponsorship?
dataset.answer: Yes, use the 'Visa Sponsorship' filter.

dataset.question: What’s the 'Resume Age' metric?
